subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The longtime open-wheel star Patrick Carpentier will attempt to qualify for the Nextel Cup races at Phoenix and Homestead, Fla., replacing Scott Riggs in the No. 10 Gillette-Evernham Motorsports Dodge. Carpentier was already set to replace Riggs in 2008, and the team decided to get a head start. He will also drive a second G.E.M. Busch Series car at Homestead.
